channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: House launches poll watcher program amid GOP-wide push for election security
item.description: House Administration Committee Chair Bryan Steil is rolling out the latest iteration of Congress' Election Observer Program this week.

item.title: White Stripes sue Trump over the use of 'Seven Nation Army' riff in social media post
item.description: The White Stripes sued former President Donald Trump on Monday in a case that alleges he used their hit song "Seven Nation Army" without permission in a video posted to social media.

item.title: The Union Members Who Never Voted for Their Union
item.description: Requiring union-recertification elections, secret-ballot votes, and a quorum would make the organizing process considerably more democratic.

item.title: If You Want Haitians Eating Cats And Decapitating Ducks In Your Town, Vote For Harris
item.description: For our managerial leadership class, the purpose of mass immigration is to dissolve the American people and create another.

item.title: Harris and Trump face off in historic debate, experts point to 'High, high stakes'
item.description: What's at stake, what the candidates need to do, and how they are preparing, as Vice President Kamala Harris and former President Trump face off Tuesday in their first and potentially only 2024 debate

item.title: Biden abandoned 90% of Afghan allies in Kabul evacuation, House report finds
item.description: As the Taliban was closing in on the U.S. embassy in Kabul, American diplomats stared at a pile of passports they had collected from Afghan allies who had assisted the war effort and were seeking a special visa to get them out of harm's way.

item.title: Club Putin, &c.
item.description: On Russia’s allies, Venezuelan refugees, Donald Trump, Tony Blair, Michael Lerner, Steph Curry, and more.

item.title: Kamala Harris’ Platform Declares War On The Supreme Court
item.description: It's a deliberate effort to turn justices into activists and make sure the court serves Democrat interests, as many lower courts already do.

item.title: Race to replace GOP governor in swing state on tap as primary season comes to a close on Tuesday
item.description: The battle to succeed retiring Republican Gov. Chris Sununu is the marquee battle as New Hampshire, Delaware and Rhode Island hold the final state primaries of the 2024 election cycle

item.title: Muslim vote still up for grabs, could tilt results in battleground states
item.description: A new survey shows that Muslim voter preferences are diverse, which could mean their vote is still up for grabs.

item.title: When Joe Biden Kneecapped His Presidency
item.description: He never really recovered from the catastrophic pullout from Afghanistan that shredded our national credibility and his own reputation.

item.title: Kamala’s Debate Strategy Is Talking About J6, 2020, And Trump Being A ‘Convicted Felon.’ It’s All She’s Got
item.description: Vibes and “joy” have exhausted their mileage. So we’re now seeing the inevitable leveling of the presidential race, in large part thanks to voters getting more exposure to Kamala Harris — who is revealing herself to be the dope she always has been. That sets things up nicely for this week’s debate on Tuesday, perhaps […]

item.title: Kamala Harris' new climate director said she is hesitant to have children because of climate change threats
item.description: The Harris campaign's new climate engagement director has questioned whether she will have kids due to fears over climate change.

item.title: George Helmy sworn in as replacement for Bob Menendez in U.S. Senate
item.description: New Jersey has a new U.S. senator after the August resignation of Democrat Bob Menendez.

item.title: The Double Standard over ‘Democratic Backsliding’ in Brazil
item.description: Because the country’s slide is now occurring under a socialist president, it isn’t attracting the same condemnation as it did under the previous right-wing leader.

item.title: Nevada Supreme Court Grants Democrats’ Request To Kick Green Party Off 2024 Ballot
item.description: The Nevada Supreme Court granted Dems' request to deny the Green Party the ability to appear on the state's 2024 presidential ballot.

item.title: Debate challenge: The pressure’s on Kamala as she and Trump trade flip-flop charges
item.description: Trump and Harris are close in many major polls. With Tuesday being the vice president's first debate in four years, the pressure is on for her to outperform the former president.

item.title: DOJ issues warning as GOP states try to clean noncitizens from voter rolls
item.description: The Justice Department issued a warning to states Monday to tread lightly in trying to clean up their election systems of bogus names and ineligible voters, firing a shot across the bow of GOP-led states that have been trying to erase noncitizens from their rolls.

item.title: Kamala Harris’s Plan to Raise the Corporate Tax Would Hurt All Americans
item.description: The corporate-income tax is one of the most economically damaging taxes there is.

item.title: Grassley Demands FBI Answer Why Agency Has Allowed Sex Crimes Go ‘Uninvestigated’
item.description: Sen. Chuck Grassley is pressing the FBI over the agency's refusal to implement a series of reforms in probing child sex crimes.
